title: Summarize after counting
description: Summarize findings after the count task is done.
closed_reason: Summarized count findings: 34 .go files in internal/ across 8 packages - engine(8), agent(7), budget(5), ticks(5), tui(4), checkpoint(3), e2e(1), update(1). Engine is largest package. Simple summarization task, no code changes required.
